title: 719. Week 3 Big Games, Chiefs Body Shop, Risky Business & Rookie Report Card
itunes:title: 719. Week 3 Big Games, Chiefs Body Shop, Risky Business & Rookie Report Card
description:
Daniel Jeremiah, Bucky Brooks and Rhett Lewis look back at the weekend and all the action from Week 3 of the NFL season. The guys start by breaking down the big 3 games from Sunday. Next, the group discuss the Los Angeles Chargers vs. Kansas City Chiefs game and then, take the Chiefs into the body shop. After that, the trio look at 8 risky business decisions from around the league. Then, the guys give a grade to the rookies that played based off their Week 3 performances. Following that, the trio analyze the first overall pick from the last 5 NFL drafts. To wrap up the show, DJ, Bucky and Rhett preview the Week 4 matchup between the Tampa Bay Buccaneers and New England Patriots.


Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
